name: Grand Hotel di Como

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013
reviews.text: We are currently staying here. Rooms lovely, pool fantastic and overall good facilities. There us one thing which us bugging us. This hotel advertises free wifi in public areas. It is free. What they don't tell you is that every 24 hours you need to collect a new username and password from reception and re-enter this. We are here for 14 days. This is becoming a bit of a daily bind. I booked this hotel partly for the fact that wifi was available. They need to get this system sorted. Pronto!
reviews.title: Good hotel- shame about the wifi

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013
reviews.text: We went to have dinner to the outside retaurant and since the beginning they could not make us feel less welcome!! We first arrived and they were very annoyed with our presence. the place was busy but that is not an excuse. the service was terrible, they did not pay attention to us at all and were very slow. The waitress was snapping every time we asked for something. we order pizza and it took 45 minutes to arrive only to be the wrong one!!! then hey brought the right one but it was undercooked and the quality was awful, especially for the amount of money you are paying!! awful experience. Dont eat there bad food and terrible service!!!
reviews.title: Terrible restaurant!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: it's my first time to Italy and I really like it .The hotel is nice and the room are beautiful and has space . The personal are nice and very welcoming specially when you just arrive at the reception
reviews.title: nice hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The internal restaurant is good but the only problem is that the proportion of the food that we aspect is low and I has not really appreciate the service made. Breakfast is great because you got a large type of food selection and drinks
reviews.title: Good location, but a totally worn out establishment.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: The best one was KK restaurant found next to the pool where everything is perfect , nice view and everything.I would just like to thank Silvia , Jisen and the guy who serve us the k-spada adrian . We pass all our holiday eating there and I could say that the service is professional compare to the internal restaurant of the hotel and we had really like it and I do remember the two ducks of the hotel but anyway I did really like my holiday with my husband
reviews.title: Perfect location to explore

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed at this hotel for 10 nights in June. The rooms are a good size with very good beds, they were very comfortable and large. The Bathroom had a great large shower, unusual for Italy! The room was kept spotlessly clean by maids who were so quick you never saw them. The pool area and gardens are fantastic and the pool man is very helpful. In fact all of the staff at the hotel were extremely helpful and would always go out of their way to chat and provide any help or information you needed. We ate in the outside restaurant which was good and the prices were not too bad.
reviews.title: A good modern hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Now to the down side, the hotel is located by a busy road, next to a factory and although it is close to the Lake you cannot see the lake. The hotel bar and inside restaurant are not that appealing to use, they feel very sterile and uninviting, also the prices are on the expensive side.
reviews.title: Wonderful surprise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Our recent staying at Grand Hotel di Como was unforgettable. Since we are member of I Prefer Club, we got an upgrade. And the hotel made our weddding anniversary perfect. Thanks to Marino and Bruno, we loved the surprise! The restaurant with brazilian grill is amazing. Valcir and Adriano make and serve the best food around.
reviews.title: Very Disappointing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I travelled with a coach tour and my first impressions, having read the hotel's website description, was a bit bewildering. It is well situated for easy access to Como etc, but the surroundings seems more industrial at first. Eventually, I discovered that there were gardens together with the swimming pool across the access road. I hadn't realised that this was part of the Grand Hotel. The pool area is lovely with comfortable sunbeds and an extremely professional and attentive pool attendant. The hotel itself appears, at first glance, to be very modern and comfortable. Unfortunately the seating both in the bar area and outside were most uncomfortable. Maybe if I were 6ft 6" I may have been able to sit in the bar area. The fact that the tables were only 6" off the floor didn't help. The staff found it difficult to serve drinks of any kind and I was fearful of having hot water tipped on me whilst the waiter tried to place cups etc onto the low tables. As we were a coach party, we were served with a welcome drink immediately as we entered the reception to book in. Although appreciated it would have bee better had this waited until we had booked in. The service in the restaurtant at dinner was abominable. The waiting staff were slow and the food although very tasty was never hot. This I put down to lack of staff. One evening we waited three quarters of an hour for our first course. Our tour manager did complain several times and asked for the dinner times to be staggered (there was another coach party as well), but was refused this. There needed to be more staff for the evening meals. Breakfast was self-service and was superb. The prices of drinks was outrageous 10€ for a vodka and 8€ for a bottle of beer. Consequently with the uncomfortable seating and the outrageous prices our evenings were not enjoyable. On a better note, the rooms were large and comfortable. The balcony was disappointing as you could not sit out (too small). The bathroom was spacious. I feel that this hotel is more suited to commercial/business purposes rather than coach tours.
reviews.title: LUXURY BY THE LAKE

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is all the website promises: there is no exaggeration.
reviews.title: Very Good Quality, Style, Comfort and Value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a good quality hotel located near Lake Como. We stayed here as an overnight stop on our 13 day COSMOS tour. We did not use this hotel to access the Lake, we just slept here and continued on to Lugano.
reviews.title: Nice hotel near Lake Como

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: The hotel is clearly 5 star, and as such you pay a bit extra for drinks at the bar - although not as bad as some. A draft beer was around 5 euro. Dinner was provided as part of the tour package and it was of an excellent standard. Presentation was fantastic.
reviews.title: LOCATION!LOCATION!LOCATION!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: WIFI was not free - it was 5 Euro for 1 hour and 12 Euro for 1 day - however if you log off when you are not using the WIFI, the clock "stops" so 1 hour is not so bad.
reviews.title: Good hotel near lake como

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel has a small gym, which includes a treadmill and weight equipment. There is also a pool and outdoor facilities (pizza, bar) which I never used so I cannot comment on them.
reviews.title: The BEST way to experience Lake Como!! STAY HERE!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only negative was that service was slow. I think this was due to the fact that they were hosting a conference and hosting a busload of tourists, the restaurant clearly suffered from a lack of staff - nobody came back and checked for drinks after the meal order.
reviews.title: We loved the location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Initially we were disappointed with the hotel, our room had a balcony in name only (you could only just stand upright on it and there was certainly no room for table and chairs). We asked for a change but the hotel was full. However, I didn't see any balconies which were larger than ours. We had paid extra for a mountain view and while we did indeed see the mountains, we didn't realise that there was an extremely busy road separating them from the hotel. Having said that, we did actually enjoy the hotel. There is a pool in the garden and in addition to the restaurant indoor, there is one in the garden in which we ate each evening. It had a relaxed, friendly atmosphere, the food was good and the hotel was very clean. As other reviewers have said, there is a very convenient boat stop five minutes from the hotel which will take you to Como. Como itself is very, very busy and not what I expected, however, we did enjoy out three nights in the hotel.
reviews.title: Good hotel in busy spot

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: We stayed here for a week in July with our 2 teenage children. The pool and gardens were lovely and very clean. We found the rooms large and clean with large showers and a huge bed!
reviews.title: nice hotel for a short holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013
reviews.text: Breakfast was plentiful with a lot of choice and served til 10.30 which suited us very well!
reviews.title: Good location, good facilities, tired rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All the staff were very friendly and knowledgable - especially the reception staff.
reviews.title: Nice hotel shame about poor restaurant service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: Downsides - no free wifi in the rooms and drinks and food in the hotel were very expensive. Fine if you are a business traveller but a bit too much for our family of 4.
reviews.title: Very Nice Hotel In Central Location

aka: Grand Hotel Di Como Italy - Lake Como
description: The Grand Hotel di Como is located in a 10,000 sq. mt. green area between Como and Cernobbio. A modern and functional property the ideal destination for clients coming to Como either on business trip or for a relaxing holiday. Rooms are enriched by beautiful reproductions of famous pictures by Gauguin, Monet and Botticelli on precious silk canvas. Large and confortable beds are the plus in every rooms.News for 2011 : a new aquamarine shaded gem in the charming park, it’s the brand new private pool, with a 32°water temperature area and hydromassage points. Il Grand Hotel di Como è circondato da un’ampia area verde tra la città di Como e Cernobbio. Un edificio moderno e funzionale, la destinazione ideale per l’uomo d’affari e per il turista. Le camere finemente arredate, sono arricchite da riproduzioni su seta di quadri di Gauguin, Monet e Botticelli. Nel 2011 è stata inaugurata la nuova piscina nel parco, con un’area termale e una vasca idromassaggio.
